= Link_PicalikeSearch
:keywords: Link_PicalikeSearch
:page-index: false

//  auto generated content Thu, 06 Jul 2017 00:43:03 +0200
== Short description

Returns a URL to the picalike image search. The item image position must be specified. In addition, the picalike search must be activated in the *Setup » Client » Settings » Online store » picalike* menu.

== Description of this function

[source,plenty]
----

Link_PicalikeSearch( int 1  ) : string

----
